subject: Baseball
Free Agents (Sports)
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: In frigid Minnesota, the Twins Winter Caravan provides sandwiches, autographs, and a question-and answer session for fans, but no news about Johan Santana, expected to be traded soon.
